org.openimaj.feature.local

Class SpatialLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.geometry.point.Point2dImpl
      • org.openimaj.feature.local.SpatialLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Location, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary, Coordinate, Point2d
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteDSIFTKeypoint, FloatDSIFTKeypoint, ScaleSpaceLocation

    public class SpatialLocation
extends Point2dImpl
implements Location, Cloneable
    SpatialLocation represents a Location in 2d-space. SpatialLocations contain x and y ordinates.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
